Literature.Title: Physicochemical and Biological Characterization of Novel Membrane-Active Cationic Lipopeptides with Antimicrobial Properties.
Literature.Author: Juhaniewicz-Dębińska J, Lasek R, Tymecka D, Burdach K, Bartosik D, Sęk S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:7% Hemolysis=10 µg/ml,Horse erythrocytes:47% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=10 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:80% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=50µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae PCM 1(MIC=20µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=20µg/ml),Yersinia enterocolitica PCM 2081(MIC=20µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 14506(MIC=30µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=5µg/ml)
